name: JVolatility
short_description:
JVolatility aims to provide a multi-platform GUI for the volatility python forensics framework. Currently the framework is just a set of modules that must be executed through complex command line parameters. But with JVolatility viewing data produced by volatility will just be a matter of clicking tabs and right clicking on listings of interest. Much more user friendly and, as a result, much less time wasted manipulating the framework and more time being productive.

Currently this project is in a "work in progress" stage so there are no zipped files for download. However current work can be checked out of our GIT repository which is here: <http://sourceforge.net/p/jvolatility/code/>.
